It is used for disharmony between the liver and stomach, accompanied by distending pain in the upper abdomen and ribs, vomiting, and acid reflux; it is also suitable for patients with chronic gastritis who display the above symptoms.
zh_law_content: 舒肝和胃，理气止痛。用于肝胃不和，胃脘胁肋胀痛，呕吐吞酸；慢性胃炎见上述证侯者。

law_content: "Tonify the liver and kidneys, nourish the blood, and calm the mind. Used for headaches and dizziness caused by liver and kidney deficiency, palpitations and uneasiness, insomnia and excessive dreaming, as well as forgetfulness."
zh_law_content: 补肝益肾，养血安神。用于肝肾不足所致头疼眩晕，心悸不宁，失眠多梦，健忘

law_content: This product is used for the treatment of patients with B-cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL) who have received at least one standard therapy regimen containing an alkylating agent but have not shown improvement or continued to progress during or after treatment.
zh_law_content: 本品用于B细胞性慢性淋巴细胞白血病（CLL）患者的治疗，这些患者至少接受过一个标准的包含烷化剂的方案的治疗，但在治疗期间或治疗后，病情并没有改善或仍持续进展。

law_content: This product is used for the treatment of first and second-degree burns and acid/alkali burns.
zh_law_content: 本品用于Ⅰ、Ⅱ度烧烫伤和酸碱灼伤。

law_content: Nurtures the spleen and kidney, enhances brain function and soothes the mind. Used for deficiency of the spleen and kidney, leading to forgetfulness and insomnia, fatigue and weakness; also used for symptoms of neurasthenia as mentioned above.
zh_law_content: 滋补脾肾，健脑宁心。用于脾肾不足，精血亏虚所致健忘失眠，困乏无力；神经衰弱见上述症状者。

law_content: It is used for memory impairment and mild to moderate cognitive dysfunction caused by various reasons such as acute and chronic cerebrovascular diseases, traumatic brain injury, various toxic brain diseases, etc. It is also used for children with delayed intellectual development.
zh_law_content: 适用于急、慢性脑血管病、脑外伤、各种中毒性脑病等多种原因所致的记忆减退及轻、中度脑功能障碍。也用于儿童智能发育迟缓。

law_content: Tonify Qi and invigorate the spleen. Used for pediatric anorexia and indigestion caused by weak spleen and stomach, and also promotes calcium absorption in children.
zh_law_content: 益气健脾。用于脾胃虚弱所致的小儿厌食症，消化不良，并促进儿童对钙的吸收。

law_content: Promote blood circulation and remove blood stasis, invigorate channels and collaterals, reduce swelling and relieve pain. Used for sprains and injuries, blood stasis swelling and pain, rheumatism with blood stasis, joint pain.
zh_law_content: 活血祛瘀，舒经活络，消肿止痛。用于跌打损伤，瘀血肿痛，风湿瘀阻，关节疼痛。

law_content: Blood activating and stasis resolving, heat clearing and diuresis promoting, used for the syndrome of chronic prostatitis associated with blood stasis obstruction and damp-heat accumulation, manifested as frequent and urgent urination, residual urine, discomfort or pain in the perineum, lower abdomen or sacral region, or burning sensation in the urethra, dampness in the scrotum, purple or dark tongue with petechiae, and greasy yellow tongue coating.
zh_law_content: 活血化淤，清热通淋，用于慢性前列腺炎属淤血阻滞兼湿热内蕴症，症见；尿频尿急；余沥不尽，会阴、下腹或腰骶部坠胀疼痛，或尿道灼热，阴囊潮湿，舌紫暗或瘀斑，舌苔黄腻等。

law_content: This product is used for chest discomfort, angina, myocardial infarction, etc.
zh_law_content: 本品用于胸闷、心绞痛、心肌梗塞等。

law_content: Detoxification, insecticidal, itch relief, and astringent. Used for scabies, eczema, seborrheic dermatitis, pruritic skin diseases, and tinea versicolor.
zh_law_content: 解毒杀虫,止痒收敛,活血祛瘀。用于疥疮，湿疹，脂溢性皮炎，瘙痒性皮肤病，花斑癣。

law_content: This product is used to stimulate appetite and aid digestion. It is used for poor appetite, indigestion, and abdominal distension caused by food stagnation.
zh_law_content: 本品用于开胃消食。本品用于食积内停所致的食欲不振、消化不良、脘腹胀闷。

law_name: 富马酸依美斯汀缓释胶囊
law_content: Used for allergic rhinitis and urticaria.
zh_law_content: 用于过敏性鼻炎和荨麻疹。

law_content:
Yi Medicine: Hi Bu Li Rang Ti Ta Rang, Nu Dou Ge.
Traditional Chinese Medicine: Soothes the liver, relieves depression, promotes blood circulation, and detoxifies. Used for primary liver cancer caused by liver stagnation and blood stasis obstructing each other.
zh_law_content: 彝医：嗨补里让提塔让，奴都格。 中医：舒肝解郁，活血解毒。用于肝郁气滞，毒瘀互阻所致的原发性肝癌。

law_content: Adjunctive therapy for acute and chronic hepatitis.
zh_law_content: 用于急慢性肝炎的辅助治疗。

law_name: 显齿蛇葡萄总黄酮含片
law_content: Anti-inflammatory and pain-relieving, detoxifying and wound-healing. Used for relieving pain in recurrent aphthous ulcers (mild and stomatitis type) with heart-spleen heat accumulation syndrome. Symptoms include oral ulceration, local pain, redness, swelling, and burning sensation, flushed face, dry mouth and nose, thirst, dry stool, dark yellow urine, red and dry tip of the tongue, yellow or greasy coating, and rapid and tense pulse.
zh_law_content: 消肿止痛、解毒敛疮。用于复发性阿弗他溃疡(轻型、口炎型)心脾积热证的疼痛缓解，症见口舌生疮，局部疼痛、红肿、灼热，面红口鼻灼干而热，口渴欲饮，便干，尿赤黄，舌尖偏红而干，苔黄或黄腻，脉弦数。

law_content: Promote digestion and resolve dampness, relieve stagnation. Used for chest and abdominal fullness caused by cold and dampness during a cold, as well as abdominal pain and diarrhea.
zh_law_content: 健胃利湿，消积导滞。用于感冒风寒，肠胃积滞所致的胸隔饱满，腹痛吐泻。

law_content:
This product is used for the following purposes:
1. Treatment of calcium deficiency, acute hypocalcemia, alkalosis, and tetany caused by hypoparathyroidism, vitamin D deficiency, etc.
2. Allergic disorders.
3. Rescue in cases of magnesium poisoning.
4. Rescue in cases of fluoride poisoning.
5. Application during cardiac resuscitation, such as rescue in high potassium or low calcium situations, or in cases of cardiac dysfunction caused by calcium channel blockers.
zh_law_content:
本品用于：
1、治疗钙缺乏，急性血钙过低、碱中毒及甲状旁腺功能低下所致的手足搐搦症，维生素D缺乏症等。
2、过敏性疾患。
3、镁中毒时的解救。
4、氟中毒的解救。
5、心脏复苏时应用，如高血钾、低血钙，或钙通道阻滞引起的心功能异常的解救。

law_name: 注射用克林霉素磷酸酯
law_content:
1. This product is used for various infectious diseases caused by Gram-positive bacteria, including tonsillitis, suppurative otitis media, sinusitis, etc. 
(2) Acute bronchitis, acute exacerbation of chronic bronchitis, pneumonia, lung abscess, and infection associated with bronchiectasis. 
(3) Skin and soft tissue infections: furuncle, carbuncle, abscess, cellulitis, trauma, burns, and post-surgical infections, etc. 
(4) Urinary tract infections: acute urethritis, acute pyelonephritis, prostatitis, etc. 
(5) Others: osteomyelitis, septicemia, peritonitis, and oral infections, etc. 

2. This product is used for various infectious diseases caused by anaerobic bacteria, including empyema, lung abscess, anaerobic pneumonia. 
(2) Skin and soft tissue infections, septicemia. 
(3) Intra-abdominal infections: peritonitis, intra-abdominal abscess. 
(4) Female pelvic and genital infections: endometritis, non-gonococcal tubal and ovarian abscess, pelvic cellulitis, and post-surgical infections in gynecology, etc.
zh_law_content:
1、本品用于革兰氏阳性菌引起的下列各种感染性疾病：
（1）扁桃体炎、化脓性中耳炎、鼻窦炎等。
（2）急性支气管炎、慢性支气管炎急性发作、肺炎、肺脓肿和支气管扩张合并感染等。
（3）皮肤和软组织感染：疖、痈、脓肿、蜂窝组织炎、创伤、烧伤和手术后感染等。
（4）泌尿系统感染：急性尿道炎、急性肾盂肾炎、前列腺炎等。
（5）其他：骨髓炎、败血症、腹膜炎和口腔感染等。
2、本品用于厌氧菌引起的各种感染性疾病：
（1）脓胸、肺脓肿、厌氧菌性肺炎。
（2）皮肤和软组织感染，败血症。
（3）腹内感染：腹膜炎、腹腔内脓肿。
（4）女性盆腔及生殖器感染：子宫内膜炎、非淋球菌性输卵管及卵巢脓肿、盆腔蜂窝组织炎及妇科手术后感染等。

law_content: Mainly used for symptoms such as urinary frequency, nocturia, and difficulty urinating caused by prostate hypertrophy. This product is not used to shrink the enlarged gland, but to improve the smooth muscle function of the urethra, bladder neck, and prostate area for therapeutic purposes. Therefore, it is suitable for mild and moderate patients, and not recommended for those with severe urinary obstruction, such as those who have already experienced severe urinary retention.
zh_law_content: 主要用于因前列腺增生所致的排尿障碍等症状，如尿频，夜尿增多、排尿困难等。由于本品是通过改善尿道、膀胱颈及前列腺部位平滑肌功能而达到治疗目的的，并非缩小增生腺体，故适用于轻，中度患者及未导致严重排尿障碍者，如已发生严重尿潴留时不应单独服用本品。

law_content: This product is suitable for the adjuvant treatment of phlegm and blood stasis obstructive hyperlipidemia.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于痰瘀阻滞型高脂血症的辅助治疗。

law_name: 精蛋白重组人胰岛素注射液
law_content: Used to treat patients with mild to moderate diabetes, severe cases should be used in conjunction with regular insulin to reduce the number of daily insulin injections and control nighttime hyperglycemia.
zh_law_content: 用于治疗中、轻度糖尿病患者，重症须与正规胰岛素合用，有利于减少每日胰岛素注射次数，控制夜间高血糖。

law_content: Nourishes and strengthens the body, prolongs life. Used for deficiency in qi and blood, palpitations, insomnia, elderly weakness, limb stiffness, poor meridian circulation, and inadequate deficiency.
zh_law_content: 滋补强身，延年益寿。用于气血亏虚，心悸失眠，老年虚弱，肢体僵直，经络不利，虚损不足之症。

law_content: This product is used to treat neurasthenia, polymyositis, dermatomyositis, atrophic muscular dystrophy, progressive muscular atrophy, and various diseases caused by immune dysfunction.
zh_law_content: 本品用于治疗神经官能症、多发性肌炎、皮肌炎、萎缩性肌强直与进行性肌营养不良以及因免疫功能所致的各种疾病。

law_content: Nourishes and strengthens, helps tonify Qi and consolidate Jing. Used for Qi and blood deficiency, sore and weak lower back and legs, cold hands and feet, nocturnal emissions, women's blood deficiency, blood coldness, excessive vaginal discharge, weakness in the limbs, and difficulty in walking.
zh_law_content: 滋补强壮，助气固精。用于气血亏损、腰酸腿痛、手足寒冷、梦遗滑精、妇女血亏、血寒、带下淋漓、四肢无力、行步艰难。

law_content: Used for dry skin and skin itching caused by seasonal changes.
zh_law_content: 用于皮肤干燥及因季节变化所引起的皮肤瘙痒症。

law_content: Mild to moderate active ulcerative colitis.
zh_law_content: 轻度至中度活动性溃疡性结肠炎。

law_content:
N-acetylcysteine tablets:
Used for expectorant treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), chronic bronchitis (CB), and pulmonary emphysema (PE) with excessive secretion of viscous sputum.
N-acetylcysteine capsules/inhalation solution: 
Used for respiratory diseases with excessive thick mucus secretion: acute bronchitis, acute exacerbations of chronic bronchitis, and bronchiectasis.
N-acetylcysteine granules:
Used for patients with chronic bronchitis and cough with viscous sputum that is difficult to expectorate.
N-acetylcysteine effervescent tablets:
Used for treatment of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), chronic bronchitis (CB), and pulmonary emphysema (PE) with excessive secretion of thick sputum.
Injectable N-acetylcysteine/N-acetylcysteine injection:
Used for early treatment of liver failure on a comprehensive treatment basis to reduce bilirubin levels and increase prothrombin activity.
N-acetylcysteine eye drops:
Used for eye diseases such as corneal punctate keratitis and herpes simplex keratitis.
zh_law_content:
乙酰半胱氨酸片：
用于分泌大量粘稠痰液的慢性阻塞性肺病（COPD）、慢性支气管炎（CB）、肺气肿（PE）等慢性呼吸系统感染的祛痰治疗。
乙酰半胱氨酸胶囊/吸入用乙酰半胱氨酸溶液：
用于浓稠痰粘液过多的呼吸系统疾病：急性支气管炎、慢性支气管炎急性发作、支气管扩张症。
乙酰半胱氨酸颗粒：
用于慢性支气管炎等咳嗽有粘痰而不易咳出的患者。
乙酰半胱氨酸泡腾片：
用于治疗分泌大量浓稠痰液的慢性阻塞性肺病（COPD），慢性支气管炎（CB）、肺气肿（PE）等慢性呼吸系统感染。
注射用乙酰半胱氨酸/乙酰半胱氨酸注射液：
用于在综合治疗基础上进行的肝衰竭早期治疗，以降低胆红素、提高凝血酶原活动度。
乙酰半胱氨酸滴眼液：
用于点状角膜炎、单纯疱疹性角膜炎等眼病。

law_content: Extinguishing wind and resolving phlegm, promoting blood circulation and stopping pain. Used for migraines, tension headaches caused by phlegm and blood stasis obstructing the meridians. Symptoms include severe pain, sometimes radiating or stabbing, extending to the eyes and teeth, accompanied by dizziness, sensitivity to light, chest tightness, abdominal distention, nausea, vomiting, irritability, and recurrent attacks.
zh_law_content: 熄风涤痰，逐瘀止痛。用于偏头痛，紧张性头痛属痰瘀阻络证，证见：痛势甚剧，或攻冲作痛，或痛如锥刺，或连及目齿，伴目眩畏光，胸闷脘胀，恶心呕吐，急躁易怒，反复发作。

law_content: Treatment for gastric and duodenal ulcers.
zh_law_content: 适用于胃及十二指肠溃疡的治疗。

law_content:
Zhēn jīng xī fēng, huà tán kāi qiào. Yòng yú diān xián fēng tán bì zǔ, tán huǒ rǎo xīn, shén hūn chōu jǔ, kǒu tǔ yán mò zhě.

Translate the above content into English:

Zhen Jing extinguishes wind and transforms phlegm, relieving symptoms such as convulsions, closed obstruction due to wind phlegm in epilepsy, disturbance of heart caused by phlegm fire, dizziness, and foaming at the mouth.
zh_law_content: 镇惊熄风，化痰开窍。用于癫痫风痰闭阻，痰火扰心，神昏抽搐，口吐涎沫者。

law_content: This product is used for anemia, yellow and thin appearance, early graying of beard and hair.
zh_law_content: 本品用于贫血，黄瘦，须发早白等。

law_content: Regulate local tissue metabolism, promote the recovery of lesion skin color, cellular tissue, and characteristics. Bamboo red antibiotic ointment is used for leukoplakia of the vulva, scar nodules, vulvar itching, and vulvitis.
zh_law_content: 调节肌体局部组织代谢机能，促进病灶肤色和细胞组织及特性的恢复。竹红菌素软膏用于外阴白色病变，疤痕疙瘩，外阴瘙痒及外阴炎。

law_content: Tonify Qi and nourish blood, nourish the liver and kidneys. Used for deficiency of qi and blood, insufficient liver and kidney function, anemia, and neurasthenia.
zh_law_content: 益气补血，滋补肝肾。用于气血亏虚，肝肾不足，贫血，神经衰弱。

law_content: Used to relieve mild to moderate pain such as joint pain, neuralgia, muscle pain, migraine, headache, menstrual pain, toothache.
zh_law_content: 用于缓解轻至中度疼痛，如关节痛、神经痛、肌肉痛、偏头痛、头痛、痛经、牙痛。

law_content: Used for children's loss of appetite, picky eating, aversions to food, and dwarfism caused by zinc deficiency.
zh_law_content: 用于小儿食欲不振、偏食、厌食及缺锌引起的侏儒症等。

law_content: This product is used for spleen deficiency and qi stagnation, retention of dampness and heat, resulting in the accumulation of retained food and water in the abdomen, abdominal distension and pain, irritability and heat with bitter taste in the mouth, belching and noisy abdomen, and difficulty in bowel movements.
zh_law_content: 本品用于脾虚气滞，湿热郁结引起的宿食蓄水，脘腹胀痛，烦热口苦，倒饱嘈杂，二便不利。

law_content: Clear heat and detoxify, relieve exterior and clear interior. Used for wind-heat common cold, symptoms include: fever, headache, aversion to wind, sore throat, thirst, constipation, and yellow urine.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒，解表清里。用于风热感冒，症见：发热，头痛，或恶风，咽痛，口渴，便秘，尿黄。

law_content: This product is used for the treatment of sore throat caused by yin deficiency and lung heat, as well as chronic pharyngitis and laryngitis.
zh_law_content: 本品用于阴虚肺热而致的咽喉肿痛，慢性咽炎、喉炎。

law_content: This product is used to treat insufficient heart qi and symptoms of anxiety, fear, and forgetfulness.
zh_law_content: 本品主治心气不足，惊恐健忘。

law_content: This product is used for symptomatic treatment of rheumatoid arthritis and pain associated with osteoarthritis (joint disease, degenerative joint disease).
zh_law_content: 本品用于类风湿关节炎的症状治疗、疼痛性骨关节炎（关节病、退行性骨关节病）的症状治疗。

law_content: This product is suitable for coma caused by traumatic brain injury, coma caused by neurosurgical operations, hepatic coma, hemiplegia, high-level paraplegia, sequelae of poliomyelitis, neurological headaches, and back pain, etc.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于脑外伤性昏迷、神经外科手术引起的昏迷、肝昏迷及偏瘫、高位截瘫、小儿麻痹后遗症、神经性头痛和腰痛等。

law_content:
1. Used to treat various types of depression.
2. Used to treat obsessive-compulsive disorder, panic disorder, and phobias.
3. Used to alleviate various chronic neuropathic pain.
zh_law_content:
1、用于治疗各种类型的抑郁症。
2、用于治疗强迫症、惊恐症、恐惧症。
3、用于缓解多种慢性神经痛。

law_content: Treatment of mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease symptoms.
zh_law_content: 轻度或中度阿尔茨海默病症状的治疗。

law_content: Convergence, hemostasis, and diarrhea control. Used for hematemesis, bloody stool, diarrhea, vomiting, epigastric pain, pediatric diarrhea, chronic diarrhea due to spleen deficiency, and chronic dysentery.
zh_law_content: 收敛，止血，止泻。用于吐血，便血，泄泻，呕吐，脘腹疼痛，小儿腹泻，脾虚久泻，久痢。

law_content:
Soothing the liver and stomach, promoting Qi movement and relieving pain. Used for liver depression and Qi stagnation, distension and fullness in the chest and hypochondria, stomach pain, noisy vomiting, belching with acid reflux. Stabbing pain in the sides, tastelessness in the mouth, indigestion, and body aches.

Translation:
Relieve liver and stomach, promote Qi circulation, and alleviate pain. Indicated for liver depression and Qi stagnation, fullness and distension in the chest and hypochondria, stomachache, noisy vomiting, acid reflux belching. Stabbing pain on the sides, tastelessness in food, indigestion, overall body pain.
zh_law_content: 舒肝和胃，理气止痛。用于肝郁气滞，胸胁胀满，胃脘疼痛，嘈杂呕吐，嗳气泛酸。两胁刺痛，饮食无味，消化不良，周身串痛。

law_content: Tonifying the spleen and stomach. Used for symptoms of stomach pain, poor appetite, and bloating caused by spleen and stomach weakness in chronic superficial gastritis.
zh_law_content: 健脾和胃。用于慢性浅表性胃炎之脾胃虚弱症引起的胃脘痛、食少纳呆、食后胀满等症状。

law_content: Clear heat, relieve exterior symptoms, stop coughing, and transform phlegm. Used for headaches and body fever caused by cold and fever in children due to suppressed appetite, with excessive coughing, shortness of breath and wheezing, swollen and painful throat, restlessness and irritability.
zh_law_content: 清热解表，止嗽化痰。用于小儿感冒风寒内热停食引起的头痛身烧，咳嗽痰盛，气促作喘，咽喉肿痛，烦燥不安。

law_content: Nourish Yin and moisten dryness, tonify blood and stop bleeding. Used for bodily weakness and constipation.
zh_law_content: 滋阴润燥，养血止血。用于体虚便秘。

law_content: This product is suitable for various causes of vitamin deficiency, such as inadequate dietary intake, debilitating diseases, as well as for pregnant and lactating women, in order to supplement the vitamins contained in this product.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于各种原因引起的维生素缺乏症，如饮食摄入不足、消耗性疾病，还有孕产妇和哺乳期妇女等，以补充本品所含的维生素。

law_content: Promoting blood circulation and relieving pain, relaxing tendons and relieving pain, dispelling wind and dispelling cold. Used for bruises and sprains, rheumatism and arthritis, characterized by swelling and pain at the injured area, and soreness and numbness in the waist and limbs.
zh_law_content: 散瘀活血，舒筋止痛，祛风散寒。用于跌打损伤、风湿痹病，症见伤处瘀肿疼痛、腰肢痠麻。

law_content:
Miao Medicine: Xu Gazi scab, cleansing the inner cavity, promoting elevation, promoting elevation, and wearing a floating autumn pipe bag. 

Traditional Chinese Medicine: Clears heat and detoxifies, promotes bile flow and reduces jaundice, used for acute and chronic hepatitis B caused by liver and gallbladder damp heat.

(Note: The translation might not be accurate as the original text seems to be a mixture of Miao dialect and Chinese medical terms, which makes it difficult to fully understand the meaning.)
zh_law_content: 苗医：旭嘎帜痂，涤内洼胗，乃兴仰，乃兴仰蒙浮秋管兜。 中医：清热解毒，利胆退黄，用于肝胆湿热所致的急慢性乙型肝炎。

law_content: This product is suitable for skin allergies such as urticaria, eczema, dermatitis, drug rash, pruritus, neurodermatitis, insect bites, and solar dermatitis. It can also be used for allergic rhinitis, vascular constrictive rhinitis, and drug and food allergies.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于皮肤过敏症：荨麻疹、湿疹、皮炎、药疹、皮肤瘙痒症、神经性皮炎、虫咬症、日光性皮炎。也可用于过敏性鼻炎、血管舒缩性鼻炎、药物及食物过敏。

law_content: The obstruction of mild to moderate urinary retention caused by heat and blood stasis in the lower jiao is manifested by difficult urination, thinning of urine stream, frequent urination, and may be accompanied by urgency, urinary pain or lower back pain; if the symptoms mentioned above are present, it may indicate prostatitis or prostate enlargement.
zh_law_content: 热瘀蕴结下焦所致的轻中度癃闭，症见排尿不畅、尿流变细、小便频数、可伴尿急、尿痛或腰痛；前列腺炎和前列腺增生见上述证候者。

law_content: This product is used for the adjuvant treatment of blood clot formation and atherosclerosis. It can also be used for vitamin B2 deficiency, oral ulcers, scrotal inflammation, and seborrheic dermatitis.
zh_law_content: 本品用于血栓形成，动脉粥样硬化的辅助治疗；也可用于维生素B2缺乏、口腔溃疡、阴囊炎、脂溢性皮炎。

law_content: Clear heat and detoxify, resolve phlegm and unblock channels, awaken the mind and open the orifices. Used for heat-induced delirium, stroke with hemiplegia, impaired consciousness, and can also be used for acute and chronic hepatitis, hepatitis B, upper respiratory tract infections, pneumonia, high fever, as well as cerebral thrombosis, cerebral hemorrhage with the aforementioned symptoms.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒，化痰通络，醒神开窍。用于热病神昏，中风偏瘫，神志不清，亦可用于急、慢性肝炎，乙型肝炎，上呼吸道感染，肺炎，高烧，以及脑血栓形成、脑出血见上述证候者。

law_content:
This product is used for:
1. Treatment of gastrointestinal stromal tumors (GIST) that have failed or are intolerant to imatinib mesylate.
2. Treatment of advanced renal cell carcinoma (RCC) that is inoperable.
zh_law_content:
本品用于：
1、甲磺酸伊马替尼治疗失败或不能耐受的胃肠道间质瘤（GIST）。
2、不能手术的晚期肾细胞癌（RCC）。

law_content: This product is suitable for various gynecological inflammations such as pelvic inflammatory disease, appendicitis, and chronic cervicitis. It is also used for upper respiratory tract infections, chronic bronchitis, pneumonia, etc.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于盆腔炎、附件炎、慢性宫颈炎等妇科各类炎症。并用于上呼吸道感染、慢性支气管炎、肺炎等。

law_content: Clear the mind and resolve phlegm, soothe the liver and relieve depression. Used for neurosis caused by liver depression transforming into fire, characterized by insomnia, excessive dreaming, restlessness in the heart, and irritability.
zh_law_content: 清心化痰，疏肝解郁。用于肝郁化火之神经衰弱，症见失眠，多梦，心中烦热，易怒。

law_content: Promote blood circulation to relieve stagnation, reduce swelling and alleviate pain. Used for local swelling and pain caused by sprains or contusions, with subcutaneous bruising; suitable for acute or chronic soft tissue injuries with the aforementioned symptoms.
zh_law_content: 舒筋活血，消肿止痛。用于跌打损伤，瘀血阻络所致的局部肿胀疼痛，皮下青紫；急慢性软组织损伤见以上症状者。

law_content: This product is used for patients with acute hepatitis A or B and a liver-gallbladder damp-heat pattern. Symptoms include distending pain in the rib area, irritability, bitter taste in the mouth, nausea, poor appetite, distending sensation in the epigastrium, abdominal bloating, fatigue, and dark yellow urine.
zh_law_content: 本品用于急性甲、乙型肝炎属肝胆湿热证者，症见胁肋胀痛，烦热口苦，恶心纳呆，脘闷腹胀，神疲乏力，小便黄赤等。

law_content: Clear heat and detoxify, reduce swelling and alleviate pain. Used to relieve mouth and throat swelling and pain caused by mouth ulcers and laryngitis, as well as a burning and dry sensation in the throat, and a feeling of foreign body in the throat.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒，消肿止痛。用于缓解口疮及喉痹引起的口腔咽喉肿痛，灼热干燥，咽喉异物感。

law_content: Tonifying the kidney and nourishing essence, benefiting the Yin and strengthening Yang. Used for symptoms caused by inadequate kidney yang, such as soreness and weakness of the waist and knees, dizziness and tinnitus, fatigue and lack of energy, as well as male infertility, low sperm count, weak sperm, and non-liquefaction of semen.
zh_law_content: 补肾益精，滋阴壮阳。用于肾阳不足所致腰膝酸软，头晕耳鸣，神疲乏力，男子无精，少精，弱精，精液不液化等症。

law_content: Soothe Liver and nourish Blood, regulate Qi and resolve depression. Used for breast distention and pain before menstruation, distention and pain in the sides, breast nodules, and worsening of pain before menstruation; for breast hyperplasia with the above symptoms.
zh_law_content: 舒肝养血，理气解郁。用于肝气郁结所致乳癖，症见经前乳房胀痛、两胁胀痛、乳房结节、经前疼痛加重；乳腺增生见上述症候者。

law_content: The product is used for rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, and various mild to moderate pain.
zh_law_content: 本品用于类风湿性关节炎、骨关节炎、以及各种轻、中度疼痛。

law_content: Clear heat and detoxify. Used for fever with thirst, sore throat, and boils.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒。用于发热口渴，咽喉肿痛，热疖疮疡。

law_content: This product is used for nocturnal emission and premature ejaculation caused by insufficient kidney qi, cold and chilly kidney essence, excessive urination with cloudy urine, lumbago and abdominal pain, cold uterus in women, irregular menstrual periods, and menstrual cramps.
zh_law_content: 本品用于肾气不固所致梦遗滑精，肾寒精冷，遗淋白浊，腰酸腹痛，妇女子宫寒冷，经血不调，经期腹痛。

law_content: This product is indicated for the treatment of relapsed or refractory classical Hodgkin lymphoma that has received at least second-line systemic chemotherapy. This indication is based on conditional approval, given the objective response rate and duration of response results from a single-arm clinical trial. Full approval of this indication will depend on whether the ongoing planned confirmatory randomized controlled clinical trial can demonstrate significant clinical benefits of brentuximab vedotin compared to standard treatment.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于至少经过二线系统化疗的复发或难治性经典型霍奇金淋巴瘤的治疗。本适应症是基于一项单臂临床试验的客观缓解率和环节持续时间结果给予的有条件批准。本适应症的完全批准将取决于正在计划开展中的确证性随机对照临床试验能否证实替雷利珠单抗治疗相对标准治疗的显著临床获益。

law_content: This product is used for cervical spondylosis (mainly nerve root type and nerve root type mixed) with liver and kidney deficiency, qi deficiency and blood stasis syndrome. Symptoms include heavy pain in the neck and shoulder, soreness in the back, numbness in the arms, weakness in the limbs, dizziness, dark red or pale spots on the tongue, thin white coating, weak or tight and rough pulse.
zh_law_content: 本品用于颈椎病（神经根型以及神经根型为主的混合型）肝肾不足，气虚血瘀证，症见颈项疼痛沉重，肩背酸痛，手臂麻木，肢体萎软无力，眩晕，舌质暗红或淡有瘀斑，苔薄白，脉沉弱，或沉弦涩。

law_content: Used for symptoms such as fever, headache, joint pain, sneezing, runny nose, nasal congestion, and sore throat caused by common cold and influenza.
zh_law_content: 用于普通感冒及流行性感冒引起的发热、头痛、关节痛、打喷嚏、流鼻涕、鼻塞、咽喉痛等症状。

law_content: This product is suitable for megaloblastic anemia, malnutrition-related anemia, pregnancy-related anemia, multiple neuritis, radiculitis, trigeminal neuralgia, sciatica, and neural paralysis. It can also be used for nutritional neurological disorders, as well as leukopenia caused by radiation and medication.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于巨幼细胞贫血、营养不良性贫血、妊娠期贫血、多发性神经炎、神经根炎、三叉神经痛、坐骨神经痛、神经麻痹。也可用于营养性神经疾患以及放射线和药物引起的白细胞减少症。

law_content: Anti-inflammatory and antipyretic. Used for fever caused by various febrile diseases, such as tonsillitis, upper respiratory tract infections, bronchitis, high fever caused by cold, and persistent fever in warm diseases.
zh_law_content: 消炎解热。用于各种热性病之发热，如扁桃腺炎、上呼吸道炎、气管炎、感冒所引起的高热以及温热病之烦热不解。

law_content: This product is used for myasthenia gravis, functional postoperative intestinal bloating, and urinary retention.
zh_law_content: 本品用于重症肌无力，手术后功能性肠胀气及尿潴留等。

law_content: Used for the treatment of stroke, Alzheimer's disease, neonatal hypoxic-ischemic encephalopathy, cranial brain injuries, spinal cord injuries, and other central nervous system injuries. Used for the treatment of traumatic peripheral nerve injuries, diabetic peripheral neuropathy, compressive neuropathies, and other peripheral nerve injuries.
zh_law_content: 用于治疗脑卒中、老年性痴呆、新生儿缺氧缺血性脑病、颅脑损伤、脊髓损伤及其它原因引起的中枢神经损伤。用于治疗创伤性周围神经损伤、糖尿病周围神经病变、压迫性神经病变等周围神经损伤。

law_content: This product is used for treating furuncles and carbuncles, deep-seated abscesses, wind-cold-damp arthralgia, limb paralysis, headache caused by a functional imbalance, and hernial pain.
zh_law_content: 本品用于痈疽发背，深部脓疡，风寒湿痹，肢体瘫痪，偏正头痛，疝气坠痛。

law_content: Promote blood circulation, remove stasis, relieve pain. Used for ineffective postpartum lochia, lower abdominal pain. It can also be used to try to stop vaginal bleeding caused by intrauterine contraceptive devices, and excessive menstrual bleeding.
zh_law_content: 活血、祛瘀，止痛。用于产后恶露不行，少腹疼痛，也可试用于上节育环后引起的阴道流血，月经过多。

law_content: This product is used for vaginitis, cervicitis, vulvitis caused by damp-heat accumulation, fungal and bacterial infections of the skin, tinea corporis, tinea pedis, eczema, etc.
zh_law_content: 本品用于湿热蕴结而致的阴道炎，子宫颈炎，外阴炎，皮肤霉菌、细菌感染，体癣、脚癣、湿疹等。

law_content: This product is used for stomach "Xiarix," which symptoms include bitter taste of stomach acid, loss of appetite, and headache due to excessive blood heat.
zh_law_content: 本品用于胃“协日”，胃酸口苦，食欲不振，血热头痛。

law_content: This product is used for wind-cold invasion, numbness of limbs, joint pain, rheumatic paralysis, and injury to tendons and bones.
zh_law_content: 本品用于受风受寒，四肢麻木，关节疼痛，风湿麻痹，伤筋动骨。

law_content: Clears the liver and stomach, reduces nausea and vomiting, regulates qi and relieves pain. Used to improve and alleviate liver and stomach disharmony type of gastric diseases. Symptoms include stomach pain and acid reflux during inhalation.
zh_law_content: 清肝和胃，降逆止呕，理气止痛。用于改善、缓解肝胃不和型胃病。胃脘疼痛、吸气吞酸等症状。

law_content: Bone pain caused by osteoporosis.
zh_law_content: 骨质疏松症引起的骨痛。

law_content: Nourishing Yin and boosting Qi, moisturizing the intestines and promoting bowel movements. Suitable for constipation caused by Qi and Yin deficiency, and dryness of the intestines.
zh_law_content: 滋阴益气，润肠通便。适用于气阴两虚、肠燥津枯之虚性便秘。

law_content: This product is used for conditions such as cold damp arthralgia, acute sprains, and soft tissue injuries.
zh_law_content: 本品用于寒湿痹症，闪挫伤筋等症。

law_content: It disperses cold, stops cough, and eliminates phlegm. Used for treating common cold and cold combined with bronchitis.
zh_law_content: 解表散寒，止咳祛痰。用于治疗伤风感冒及感冒合并支气管炎者。

law_content: Miao medicine: Traditional Chinese medicine: Relieve wind and eliminate dampness, promote meridian circulation and alleviate pain. Used for rheumatism, arthralgia, and lumbar muscle strain.
zh_law_content: 苗医：中医：祛风除湿，通络止痛。用于风湿痹痛、腰肌劳损。

law_content: Supplement of calcium for children, pregnant women, and breastfeeding women.
zh_law_content: 用于儿童、孕妇及哺乳期妇女钙质的补充。

law_name: 小牛血去蛋白提取物眼用凝胶
law_content: Used for various causes of corneal ulcers, corneal injuries, corneal burns caused by alkali or acid, bullous keratopathy, neurotrophic keratitis, corneal and conjunctival dystrophy.
zh_law_content: 用于各种起因的角膜溃疡，角膜损伤，由碱或酸引起的角膜灼伤， 大泡性角膜炎，神经麻痹性角膜炎，角膜和结膜变性。

law_content: Mainly used for bacterial dysentery, enteritis, cholera caused by sensitive bacteria, can also be used for typhoid fever, paratyphoid fever, Giardia infection, trichomoniasis, etc. It can be used in combination with antacids and other drugs to treat Helicobacter pylori-induced gastritis.
zh_law_content: 主要用于敏感菌所致的细菌性痢疾，肠炎、霍乱，也可以用于伤寒、副伤寒、贾第鞭毛虫病、滴虫病等。与制酸剂等药物合用于治疗幽门螺杆菌所致的胃窦炎。

law_content: Clear heat and dry dampness, diuresis and promote urination. Used for symptoms such as difficult urination, frequent urination, urgent urination, painful urination, and lower limb swelling; it can also be used for acute and chronic glomerulonephritis, pyelonephritis, cystitis, urethritis, and other conditions with the above symptoms.
zh_law_content: 清热燥湿,利尿通淋。用于小便不利,尿频,尿急,尿痛,下肢浮肿等症；也可用于急慢性肾小球肾炎,肾盂肾炎,膀胱炎,尿道炎,见有上述症状者。

law_content: Used for the treatment of primary hypertension. This product can be used alone or in combination with other anti-hypertensive medications.
zh_law_content: 用于治疗原发性高血压。本品可单独使用，也可与其它抗高血压药物联用。

law_content: Used for acute tonsillitis, acute pharyngitis, sinusitis; pneumonia, mycoplasma infection, whooping cough, etc.
zh_law_content: 用于急性扁桃体炎、急性咽炎、鼻窦炎；肺炎、支原体感染、百日咳等。

law_content: Mainly used for the treatment of infections caused by sensitive Gram-positive bacteria, such as pneumonia, acute bronchitis, chronic bronchitis with lung infection, acute tonsillitis, acute mastitis, etc.
zh_law_content: 主要用于治疗敏感革兰氏阳性菌所致感染，如肺炎、急性支气管炎、慢支合并肺部感染、急性扁桃腺炎、急性乳腺炎等。

law_content: Used to treat eye infections caused by Escherichia coli, Haemophilus influenzae, Klebsiella genus, Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus haemolyticus, and other susceptible bacteria, including trachoma, conjunctivitis, keratitis, and blepharitis.
zh_law_content: 用于治疗沙眼、结膜炎、角膜炎、眼睑缘炎等由大肠杆菌、流感嗜血杆菌、克雷伯菌属、金黄色葡萄球菌、溶血性链球菌和其他敏感菌所致眼部感染

law_content: Tonify Qi and replenish Blood, cool Blood and stop bleeding. Suitable for auxiliary treatment of mild cases of excessive menstrual flow due to deficiency of Qi and Blood, and prolonged menstrual periods.
zh_law_content: 益气补血，凉血止血。适用于气血不足型月经过多，经期延长病情较轻者的辅助治疗。

law_content: Used for cerebral vascular diseases such as cerebral hypoperfusion, cerebral thrombosis, cerebral embolism, and other ischemic vascular diseases such as angina pectoris and myocardial infarction in coronary heart disease, ischemic stroke, thromboangiitis obliterans, etc.
zh_law_content: 用于闭塞性脑血管病如脑供血不全、脑血栓形成、脑栓塞及其它缺血性血管疾病如冠心病的心绞痛、心肌梗塞，缺血性中风，血栓闭塞性脉管炎等症。

law_content: This product is used for treating hair loss.
zh_law_content: 本品用于治疗脱发。

law_content: Promoting blood circulation, resolving stasis, dispelling wind and eliminating dampness, and activating qi to relieve pain. It is used for low back pain caused by blood stasis and qi stagnation, characterized by pain in the lower back and legs, with fixed pain that worsens upon touch. Mild cases may experience discomfort when bending or stretching, while severe cases suffer from intense pain and difficulty changing positions. For patients with lumbar disc herniation exhibiting the mentioned symptoms.
zh_law_content: 活血化瘀，祛风除湿，行气止痛。用于血瘀气滞、脉络闭阻所致腰痛，症见腰腿疼痛，痛有定处，痛处拒按，轻者俯仰不便，重者剧痛不能转侧；腰椎间盘突出症见上述证候者。

law_content: Clearing heat, detoxification, and anti-inflammatory. Used for acute and chronic tonsillitis, acute and chronic pharyngitis, upper respiratory tract infections.
zh_law_content: 清热，解毒，消炎。用于急慢性扁桃体炎，急慢性咽喉炎，上呼吸道感染。

law_content: This product is used for the treatment of chronic bronchitis.
zh_law_content: 本品用于治疗慢性支气管炎。

law_content: Stop coughing and phlegm discharge. Used for lung heat cough with yellow-colored phlegm.
zh_law_content: 止嗽祛痰。用于肺热咳嗽，痰多色黄。

law_content: Nourish the spleen, invigorate qi, and nourish yin. Used for spleen and kidney qi and yin deficiency, symptoms include fatigue, weak lower back and knees, lack of appetite, poor sleep, or post-operative weakness due to prolonged illness.
zh_law_content: 健脾，益气，养阴。用于脾肾气阴两虚，症见体倦乏力，腰膝酸软，食欲不振，睡眠欠佳或久病、术后体虚者。

law_content: This product is used for cold and flu symptoms, dizziness from heatstroke, motion sickness, headache, abdominal pain, and itchy skin.
zh_law_content: 本品用于伤风感冒，中暑头晕，舟车晕浪，头痛腹痛，皮肤瘙痒。

law_content:
This product is used for the prevention and treatment of scurvy and various acute and chronic infectious diseases, as well as supportive treatment for purpura. It is also used in high doses for intravenous injection for the treatment of beriberi, and as a rescue treatment for cardiogenic shock. It can also be used for the treatment of chronic iron poisoning and idiopathic high iron hemoglobinemia. The following conditions increase the need for vitamin C:

1. Patients receiving chronic hemodialysis, gastrointestinal diseases (chronic diarrhea, gastric or ileal resection), tuberculosis, cancer, peptic ulcers, hyperthyroidism, fever, infection, trauma, burns, and surgery, etc.
2. Patients receiving enteral nutrition due to strict dietary control or selection, who may experience malnutrition, rapid weight loss, as well as during pregnancy and lactation.
3. Patients using barbiturates, tetracyclines, salicylic acid, or using vitamin C as an acidifying agent for the urinary system.

Note: The translation provided is a general translation and may not accurately convey the medical information provided. It is always recommended to consult with a healthcare professional for accurate information and advice.
zh_law_content:
本品适用于防治坏血病和各种急慢性传染性疾病及紫癜等辅助治疗，大剂量静脉注射用于克山症，心源性休克时抢救。本品亦可用于慢性铁中毒，特发性高铁血红蛋白血症的治疗。下列情况对维生素C的需要量增加：
1、病人接受慢性血液透析、胃肠道疾病（长期腹泻、胃或回肠切除术后）结核病、癌症、溃疡病、甲状腺功能亢进、发热、感染、创伤、烧伤、手术等。
2、因严格控制或选择饮食，接受肠道外营养的病人，因营养不良，体重骤降，以及在妊娠期和哺乳期。
3、应用巴比妥类、四环素类、水杨酸类，或以维生素C作为泌尿系统酸化药。

law_content: Nourish and moisten the lungs, transform phlegm and stop coughing. Used for lung and kidney yin deficiency, dry cough with little phlegm, dry throat and sore throat.
zh_law_content: 养阴润肺，化痰止咳。用于肺肾阴虚，燥咳少痰，咽干喉痛。

law_content: This product is suitable for patients with mild to moderate type 2 diabetes who have not achieved satisfactory results after 2-3 months of dietary control and physical exercise. These patients should have a certain degree of insulin secretion function in their pancreatic β cells, without acute complications such as infection, trauma, ketoacidosis, or hyperosmolar coma. They should also not be pregnant and should not have severe chronic complications.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于经饮食控制及体育锻炼2～3个月疗效不满意的轻，中度2型糖尿病患者，这类糖尿病患者的胰岛B细胞需有一定的分泌胰岛素功能，且无急性并发症(如感染，创伤，酮症酸中毒，高渗性昏迷等)，不合并妊娠，无严重的慢性并发症。

law_content:
1. It is mainly used in combination with other anti-tuberculosis drugs for the initial treatment of various tuberculosis diseases caused by Mycobacterium tuberculosis or other susceptible mycobacteria infections.
2. It can be used alone to treat tularemia, or in combination with other antibiotics for the treatment of plague, inguinal granuloma, brucellosis, rat-bite fever, etc.
3. It can also be used in combination with penicillin or ampicillin for the treatment of endocarditis caused by Streptococcus viridans or enterococci.

1. It is mainly used in combination with other anti-tuberculosis drugs for the initial treatment of various tuberculosis diseases caused by Mycobacterium tuberculosis or other susceptible mycobacteria infections.
2. It can be used alone to treat tularemia or in combination with other antibiotics for the treatment of plague, inguinal granuloma, brucellosis, rat-bite fever, etc.
3. It can also be used in combination with penicillin or ampicillin for the treatment of endocarditis caused by Streptococcus viridans or enterococci.
zh_law_content:
1、主要与其他抗结核药联合用于结核分枝杆菌所致各种结核病的初治病例，或其他敏感分枝杆菌感染。
2、可单用于治疗土拉菌病，或与其他抗菌药物联合用于鼠疫、腹股沟肉芽肿、布鲁菌病、鼠咬热等的治疗。
3、亦可与青霉素或氨苄西林联合治疗草绿色链球菌或肠球菌所致的心内膜炎。

law_content: Tonify the stomach and resolve phlegm, tranquilize the mind and stabilize the spirit. Used for deficiency of the heart and gallbladder, easily startled by events, palpitations and restlessness, and insomnia due to deficiency and restlessness.
zh_law_content: 和胃化痰，安神定志。用于心胆虚怯，触事易惊，心悸不安，虚烦不寐。

law_content: Xinliang Jiebiao, Qingre Jiedu. Used for fever, headache, cough, and sore throat caused by wind-heat cold.
zh_law_content: 辛凉解表，清热解毒。用于风热感冒引起的发热头痛、咳嗽、咽喉疼痛。

law_content: This product is used for cytomegalovirus retinitis in individuals with immunodeficiency disorders, including patients with AIDS. It also serves as a preventive treatment for cytomegalovirus infection in organ transplant recipients.
zh_law_content: 本品用于免疫功能缺陷者（包括艾滋病患者）发生的巨细胞病毒性视网膜炎；预防可能发生于接受器官移植者的巨细胞病毒感染。

law_content: This product is used for lung deficiency with chronic cough, dry mouth and thirst, biliary ascariasis, and chronic diarrhea, etc.
zh_law_content: 本品用于肺虚久咳，口干烦渴，胆道蛔虫症，慢性腹泻等症。

law_content: Nourish Qi and blood, warm the middle and dispel cold. Used for chronic illness and weakness, postpartum cold and abdominal pain, deficiency of Qi and blood.
zh_law_content: 补养气血，温中散寒。用于久病体虚，产后虚寒腹痛，气血亏损。

law_content: Cough expectorant. Used for cold, cough, acute and chronic bronchitis.
zh_law_content: 止咳化痰。用于伤风咳嗽及急、慢性支气管炎。

law_content: Expel wind, eliminate dampness, relieve itching, and reduce swelling. Suitable for subacute eczema, chronic eczema.
zh_law_content: 祛风，除湿，止痒，消肿。适用于亚急性湿疹，慢性湿疹。

law_content: Auxiliary treatment for immunodeficiency, recurrent respiratory infections, leukopenia, aplastic anemia, and tumors, to alleviate the adverse reactions on hematopoietic system and gastrointestinal tract caused by radiotherapy and chemotherapy.
zh_law_content: 用于免疫功能低下、反复呼吸道感染、白细胞减少症和再生障碍性贫血及肿瘤的辅助治疗，减轻放、化疗对造血系统的不良反应和胃肠道反应。

law_content: For adult patients undergoing elective hip or knee replacement surgery, prevention of venous thromboembolism (VTE).
zh_law_content: 用于髋关节或膝关节择期置换术的成年患者，预防静脉血栓栓塞事件(VTE)。

law_name: 马来酸左氨氯地平分散片
law_content:
1. Hypertension: This product can be used alone or in combination with other antihypertensive medications for the treatment of hypertension.
2. Chronic stable angina and variant angina: This product can be used alone or in combination with other anti-anginal medications for the treatment of chronic stable angina and variant angina.
zh_law_content: 1、血压病。可单独使用本品治疗也可与其它抗高血压药物合用。 2、慢性稳定性心绞痛及变异型心绞痛。可单独使用本品治疗也可与其它抗心绞痛药物合用。

law_content: This product is a gastric mucosal protective drug used as an adjunctive treatment for gastric ulcers.
zh_law_content: 本品为胃黏膜保护药物，辅助用于胃溃疡治疗。

law_content: This product is used for myocardial ischemia.
zh_law_content: 本品用于心肌缺血。

law_content: Applicable to acute pharyngitis, tonsillitis, otitis media, bronchitis, pneumonia and other respiratory tract infections, urinary tract infections, and skin and soft tissue infections caused by sensitive bacteria. This product is an orally administered preparation and is not suitable for severe infections.
zh_law_content: 适用于敏感菌所致的急性咽炎、扁桃体炎、中耳炎、支气管炎和肺炎等呼吸道感染、泌尿生殖道感染及皮肤软组织感染等.本品为口服制剂，不宜用于严重感染。

law_content: This product is used for relieving the systemic and local symptoms of chronic idiopathic urticaria and perennial allergic rhinitis.
zh_law_content: 本品用于缓解慢性特发性荨麻疹及常年性过敏性鼻炎的全身及局部症状。

law_content: Used for seasonal or perennial allergic rhinitis, hives caused by allergens, and itching of the skin.
zh_law_content: 用于季节性或常年性过敏性鼻炎、由过敏原引起的荨麻疹及皮肤瘙痒。

law_content: This product is mainly used for bleeding caused by excessive fibrinolysis, including acute and chronic, localized or systemic hyperfibrinolysis, the latter of which is commonly seen in cancers, leukemia, gynecological accidents, and severe liver disease bleeding.
zh_law_content: 本品主要用于因原发性纤维蛋白溶解过度所引起的出血，包括急性和慢性、局限性或全身性的高纤溶出血，后者常见于癌肿、白血病、妇产科意外、严重肝病出血等。

law_content: Promote Qi circulation and resolve stasis, clear heat and promote urination. Used for conditions such as gallstones, kidney stones, bladder stones, obstructive jaundice, cholecystitis, etc., when there is evidence of damp-heat accumulation causing congestion.
zh_law_content: 行气散结，清热通淋。用于胆结石，肾结石，膀胱结石，阻塞性黄疸，胆囊炎等病见湿热蕴结之证者

law_content: This product is used for patients with liver depression and qi stagnation, phlegm stagnation, and blood stasis syndrome of breast cystic hyperplasia. Symptoms include breast distension, aggravation before menstruation, breast lump, tenderness upon touch, chest oppression and stuffiness, irritability, thin white tongue coating, and wiry or wiry thin pulse.
zh_law_content: 本品用于乳腺囊性增生病患者的肝郁气滞兼痰凝血瘀证候。症见乳房胀痛、经前加重、乳房肿块、触之疼痛、胸胁胀闷、烦躁易怒、舌苔薄白、脉象弦或弦细、弦滑。

law_content: This product is used for acute infectious diarrhea caused by rotavirus gastroenteritis and enteropathogenic Escherichia coli enteritis. According to Traditional Chinese Medicine, it belongs to the pattern of damp-heat diarrhea. The symptoms include urgent and frequent watery diarrhea or incomplete bowel movements, yellow-brown stool or loose stools with foul odor, burning sensation in the anus, thirst, short and red urine, and slippery or rapid pulse.
zh_law_content: 本品用于轮状病毒性肠炎、致泻性大肠杆菌性肠炎所致的急性感染性腹泻，中医辨证属于湿热泄泻，症见泄泻腹痛，泻下急迫，或大便不爽，粪色黄褐，或呈稀水便，气味臭秽，肛门灼热，口渴，小便短赤，脉滑数或濡滑。

law_content: Fading spots, eliminating dampness, promoting blood circulation. Used for skin sores, acne, rosacea, freckles, chloasma, vitiligo, and athlete's foot caused by dampness and toxins.
zh_law_content: 消斑，燥湿，活血。用于皮肤疮癣，粉刺疙瘩，酒糟赤鼻，雀斑，汗斑，白癜风，湿毒脚气。

law_content:
Miao medicine: Xuga Yitazhejia, Yangan Zhangzhen, Pomei Jingdangmeng. Jiang Gang Ouwangnang, Gangmei Jipu, Xiega Fa, Jiang Diga Xiong Jifang.
Traditional Chinese medicine: Clearing heat and detoxifying, dispersing stasis and relieving pain. Used for herpes zoster caused by liver fire toxicity, itchy skin, insect bite dermatitis, and epidemic parotitis.
Translate the above content into English:
zh_law_content: 苗医：旭嘎怡沓痂，泱安漳砧，迫喔经挡孟。蒋刚欧娃囊、港么给普，泻嘎发，蒋底嘎熊及仿。中医：清热解毒，散瘀止痛。用于肝经火毒所致的带状疱疹，皮肤瘙痒，虫咬皮炎，流行性腮腺炎。

law_content: For the treatment of fever caused by common cold or influenza, as well as for alleviating mild to moderate pain such as headache, joint pain, migraines, toothache, muscle pain, neuralgia, and menstrual pain.
zh_law_content: 用于普通感冒或流行性感冒引起的发热，也用于缓解轻至中度疼痛如头痛、关节痛、偏头痛、牙痛、肌肉痛、神经痛、痛经。

law_content: Used for the fever caused by common cold or influenza in children, also used to relieve mild to moderate pain such as headache, joint pain, migraine, toothache, muscle pain, nerve pain, and menstrual pain.
zh_law_content: 用于儿童普通感冒或流行性感冒引起的发热，也用于缓解轻至中度疼痛如头痛、关节痛、偏头痛、牙痛、肌肉痛、神经痛、痛经。

law_content: Clearing heat and detoxifying, dispelling wind and relieving pain. Used for wind-heat cold, fever, headache, and discomfort in the limbs.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒，祛风止痛。用于风热感冒，发烧头痛，肢体不适。

law_content: This product is used for various life-threatening ventricular tachycardias.
zh_law_content: 本品用于各种危及生命的室性快速型心律失常。

law_content: Clear heat and detoxify, cool blood and benefit the throat, reduce swelling. Used for tonsillitis and sore throat.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒,凉血利咽，消肿。用于扁桃腺炎，咽喉肿痛。

law_content: Promoting blood circulation and regulating menstruation, relieving pain and promoting Qi. Used for menstrual disorders, dysmenorrhea, and postpartum abdominal pain caused by Qi stagnation and blood stasis.
zh_law_content: 活血调经，行气止痛。用于气滞血瘀所致月经不调，痛经，产后瘀血腹痛。

law_content: Adjuvant treatment for chronic hepatitis B, liver cancer, and elderly individuals with compromised immune function.
zh_law_content: 用于慢性乙型肝炎、肝癌及老年免疫功能低下者的辅助治疗。

law_content: This product can be used as an adjunctive treatment for dietary control and exercise in adult patients with type 2 diabetes who are suitable for treatment with liraglutide and metformin, to improve their blood glucose control levels.
zh_law_content: 本品可作为饮食控制和运动的辅助治疗，适用于适合接受利格列汀和二甲双胍治疗的2型糖尿病成年患者，用以改善这些患者的血糖控制水平。

law_content: Relieve wind and resolve the surface, detoxify and soothe the throat. Used for pediatric wind-heat cold, fever with aversion to wind, headache, red eyes, and swollen throat.
zh_law_content: 疏风解表，解毒利咽。用于小儿风热感冒，发热恶风，头痛目赤，咽喉肿痛。

law_content: This product is used for lower respiratory and genitourinary infections caused by sensitive bacteria.
zh_law_content: 本品用于敏感菌引起的下呼吸道和泌尿生殖系统感染。

law_content: Improve bone density in patients with osteoporosis.
zh_law_content: 提高骨质疏松症患者的骨量。

law_content: Promote qi circulation, activate blood, and aid in bowel movement and detoxification. Used for constipation, acne, and facial discoloration caused by qi deficiency, blood stasis, and excessive internal heat.
zh_law_content: 益气活血，通便排毒。用于气虚血瘀，热毒内盛所致便秘、痤疮、颜面色斑。

law_content: This product is used for the treatment of chronic hepatitis B with damp-heat in the liver and gallbladder, combined with deficiency of the spleen and stagnant liver qi. Symptoms include distension and fullness in the right hypochondrium, nausea and aversion to oily foods, poor appetite and reduced food intake, and a bland taste in the mouth.
zh_law_content: 本品用于慢性乙型病毒性肝炎肝胆湿热兼脾虚肝郁证，症见右胁胀满、恶心厌油、纳差食少、口淡乏味。

law_content: This product is used to prevent urinary tract toxicity caused by oxazaphosphorine cytotoxic drugs (ifosfamide, cyclophosphamide, or melphalan), especially in high-risk patients with a history of pelvic radiotherapy, previous use of ifosfamide, cyclophosphamide, or melphalan leading to cystitis, or existing urogenital diseases.
zh_law_content: 本品用于预防氧氮磷环类化疗药物（异环磷酰胺、环磷酰胺、曲磷胺）引起的的泌尿道毒性，尤其是既往接受小骨盆放疗、既往使用异环磷酰胺、环磷酰胺或曲磷胺治疗导致膀胱炎或存在泌尿道疾病时的高危患者。

law_content:
1. Essential hypertension: It can be used alone or in combination with other antihypertensive drugs, especially thiazide diuretics.
2. Heart failure: Mild or moderate heart failure (NYHA class II or III), combined use of digitalis drugs, diuretics, and angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (ACEIs). It can also be used in patients with ACEI intolerance and in those who are treated with or without digitalis drugs, hydralazine, or nitrate drugs.
zh_law_content:
1.原发性高血压：可单独用药，也可和其它降压药合用，尤其是噻嗪类利尿剂。
2.心功能不全：轻度或中度心功能不全(NYHA分级II或III级)，合并应用洋地黄类药物、利尿剂和血管紧张素转换酶抑制剂（ACEI）。也可用于ACEI不耐受和使用或不使用洋地黄类药物、肼屈嗪或硝酸酯类药物治疗的心功能不全者。

law_content: Nourishes Yin, clears heat, moisturizes the intestines, and promotes bowel movements. Used as an adjuvant treatment for constipation and dryness due to Yin deficiency and internal heat, accompanied by dry mouth and throat.
zh_law_content: 养阴清热，润肠通便。用于阴虚内热所致的大便干结，排便不畅，口干咽燥的辅助治疗。

law_name: 注射用硫酸普拉睾酮钠
law_content: This product is used to ripen the cervix before full-term induction of labor.
zh_law_content: 本品用于妊娠足月引产前使宫颈成熟。

law_content: Nourish liver and tonify kidneys, promote blood circulation. Used for bone hyperplasia such as lumbago and joint pain caused by deficiency of both liver and kidneys.
zh_law_content: 补肝益肾，活血。用于肝肾两虚所致的腰膝骨关节酸痛等骨质增生症。

law_content: This product is used for blood deficiency and withered yellow complexion, irregular menstruation, and abdominal pain during menstruation.
zh_law_content: 本品用于血虚萎黄，月经不调，经行腹痛。

law_content:
This product is suitable for patients with gastrointestinal dysfunction or partial gastrointestinal dysfunction who cannot or do not want to eat enough regular food to meet their body's nutritional needs. It is mainly used for: 
1. Metabolic gastrointestinal dysfunction, pancreatitis; inflammatory gastrointestinal diseases; radiation enteritis and chemotherapy; intestinal fistula; short bowel syndrome; HIV/AIDS. 
2. Critical illnesses: extensive burns; trauma; sepsis; postoperative recovery period. 
3. Preoperative feeding for malnourished patients. 
4. Intestinal preparation: This product can be used for diabetic patients.
zh_law_content: 本本品适用于有胃肠道功能或部分胃肠道功能而不能或不愿吃足够数量的常规食物以满足机体营养需求的肠内营养治疗的病人，主要用于：1.代谢性胃肠道功能障碍 胰腺炎；肠道炎性疾病；放射性肠炎和化疗；肠瘘；短肠综合征；艾滋病病毒/艾滋病。2.危重疾病：大面积烧伤；创伤；脓毒血症；大手术后的恢复期。3.营养不良病人的手术前喂养。4.肠道准备：本品能用于糖尿病病人。

law_name: 双唑泰栓;双唑泰阴道膨胀栓
law_content: Used for bacterial vaginosis, fungal vaginitis, trichomonal vaginitis, and mixed infectious vaginitis.
zh_law_content: 用于细菌性阴道炎、霉菌性阴道炎、滴虫性阴道炎以及混合感染性阴道炎。

law_content: Treatment for mild to moderate hypertension can be used alone or in combination with other antihypertensive medications, especially thiazide diuretics.
zh_law_content: 治疗轻、中度高血压，可单独或与其它抗高血压药（尤其是噻嗪类利尿剂）联合应用。

law_content: This product is used for hypophosphatemia. Hypophosphatemia can occur in acute situations such as blood transfusion, surgery under extracorporeal circulation, and parenteral nutrition. It is also associated with some chronic conditions such as chronic alcoholism, long-term malnutrition, and chronic respiratory failure leading to phosphate depletion.
zh_law_content: 本品用于低磷酸血症。低磷酸血症可在急性情况，如输血、在体外循环下进行手术、胃肠外营养时出现；也与一些慢性疾病，如慢性酒精中毒、长期营养不良、慢性呼吸衰竭中磷酸的耗竭有关。

law_content: ?Clearing heat and detoxification. It is used for excessive internal heat, red and swollen throat, gum pain, oral ulcers, and red and swollen eyes.
zh_law_content: ?清热解毒。用于火热内盛，咽赤肿痛，牙龈肿痛，口舌生疮，目赤肿痛

law_content: Anticancer, anti-inflammatory, and anti-asthmatic. Used for esophageal cancer, stomach cancer, lung cancer, and liver cancer. Also effective for malignant lymphoma, colon cancer, cervical cancer, leukemia, and other malignant tumors. Can be used in combination with radiotherapy, chemotherapy, and postoperative treatment. Also used for chronic bronchitis and bronchial asthma.
zh_law_content: 抗癌，消炎，平喘。用于食道癌、胃癌、肺癌、肝癌。对恶性淋巴癌、大肠癌、宫颈癌、白血病等恶性肿瘤亦有疗效。并可配合放疗、化疗和手术后治疗。并用于慢性气管炎、支气管哮喘。

law_content: Supplement the kidney and nourish essence, support yang and improve flaccidity. Used for sexual dysfunction such as erectile dysfunction and premature ejaculation caused by kidney deficiency and yang deficiency.
zh_law_content: 补肾益精，助阳兴萎。用于肾虚阳衰引起的阳萎、早泄等性功能低下症

law_content: This product is used for cough with a cold, uncomfortable expectoration, acute and chronic bronchitis, and asthma.
zh_law_content: 本品用于寒性咳嗽，咯痰不爽，急慢性支气管炎，哮喘。

law_content: This product is used for angina and shortness of breath.
zh_law_content: 本品用于心绞痛，胸闷憋气。

law_content: This product is used for central serous chorioretinopathy caused by liver and kidney yin deficiency. The symptoms include decreased vision, distorted color perception, and metamorphopsia.
zh_law_content: 本品用于肝肾阴虚之中心性浆液性脉络膜视网膜病变，症见：视力下降，视瞻有色，视物变形等。

law_content: Qing Jian Xue. Used for blood heat headache, thirsty and red eyes, heat stroke.
zh_law_content: 清讧血。用于血热头痛，口渴目赤，中暑。

law_content: Clear heat and detoxify, activate blood circulation and alleviate pain. Used for the treatment of gastric pain, abdominal pain, localized pain, pain aggravated by touch, with wiry or tight and thin pulse, etc. Typically observed in the early stages of acute uncomplicated appendicitis, presenting with significant tenderness or rebound pain in the right lower abdomen.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒，活血止痛。用于瘀滞型的胃脘痛、腹痛、痛有定处、痛处拒按、脉弦紧或涩细等症。见于早期急性单纯性阑尾炎所致的右下腹有固定而明显的压痛或反跳痛等症。

law_content: Clear heat and dampness, eliminate stasis and relieve pain, and contract and stop discharge. It is used for acute and chronic pelvic inflammation, characterized by lower abdominal distension, lower back pain, increased vaginal discharge, and irregular menstruation, caused by damp-heat descending and stasis obstructing the uterus.
zh_law_content: 清热利湿，祛瘀止痛，收敛止带。用于急、慢性盆腔炎见下腹胀痛、腰痛、带下增多、月经不调等症属于湿热下注、瘀阻胞宫所致者。

law_content: Supplement the lung and kidney, nourish the essence and qi. Used for cough, wheezing, hemoptysis, and lower back pain caused by lung and kidney deficiency; auxiliary treatment for chronic bronchitis and chronic renal insufficiency.
zh_law_content: 补肺肾，益精气。用于肺肾两虚引起的咳嗽、气喘、咯血、腰背酸痛；慢性支气管炎、慢性肾功能不全的辅助治疗。

law_content: This product is used for Parkinson's disease, Parkinson's syndrome, drug-induced extrapyramidal disorders, Parkinson's syndrome after carbon monoxide poisoning, and Parkinson's syndrome in elderly patients with coexisting cerebral arteriosclerosis. It is also used for prevention and treatment of respiratory tract infections caused by A-type influenza virus.
zh_law_content: 本品用于帕金森病、帕金森综合征、药物诱发的锥体外系疾患，一氧化碳中毒后帕金森综合征及老年人合并有脑动脉硬化的帕金森综合征。也用于防治A型流感病毒所引起的呼吸道感染。

law_content:
This product is used to treat cases where it is necessary to lower the blood concentration of sex steroids to castration levels in order to achieve therapeutic effects. Examples include:

1. Men: Hormone-dependent prostate cancer.
2. Women: Endometriosis, uterine fibroids, or assisted reproductive techniques (ART) such as in vitro fertilization (IVF).
zh_law_content:
本品用于治疗一般需要把性类固醇血浓度降低至去势水平而达治疗效果的症例。例如：
1、男性：激素依赖性前列腺癌。
2、女性：子宫内膜异位症、子宫肌瘤或辅助生育技术（ART），例如体外授精术（IVF）。

law_name: 双氯芬酸二乙胺乳胶剂
law_content: To relieve mild to moderate pain in muscles, soft tissues, and joints. For example, to relieve pain caused by muscle and soft tissue sprains, strains, bruises, overexertion, lower back injuries, and joint pain. It can also be used for symptomatic treatment of osteoarthritis.
zh_law_content: 用于缓解肌肉、软组织和关节的轻至中度疼痛。如：缓解肌肉、软组织的扭伤、拉伤、挫伤、劳损、腰背部损伤引起的疼痛以及关节疼痛等。也可用于骨关节炎的对症治疗。

law_content: Used for trichomonas or candidal vaginitis, chronic cervicitis, and can also be used for senile vaginitis, pelvic inflammatory disease, etc.
zh_law_content: 用于滴虫或念珠菌性阴道炎、慢性宫颈炎，亦可用于老年性阴道炎、盆腔炎等。

law_content:
Supplement the kidney and consolidate essence, invigorate qi and nourish the primordial. Used for mental fatigue, soreness and weakness in the waist and knees, fatigue in the limbs, and cold intolerance due to kidney yang deficiency.

Translate the above content into English:

Replenish the kidneys and strengthen essence, enhance energy and nurture the primordial. Used for lack of mental vigor, soreness and weakness in the waist and knees, weakness in the limbs, and sensitivity to cold caused by kidney yang deficiency.
zh_law_content: 补肾固精，益气培元。用于肾阳不足所致精神不振，腰膝酸软，四肢乏力，形寒怕冷。

law_content: This product is primarily used to improve the reduction of bone mass in osteoporosis.
zh_law_content: 本品主要用于改善骨质疏松症的骨量减少。

law_content: This product is suitable for infections caused by sensitive bacteria in the respiratory tract, urinary tract, bones and joints, skin and soft tissues, abdominal cavity, biliary tract, sensory organs, and reproductive organs. It is effective against infections caused by burns, trauma, sepsis, and central nervous system infections. Especially for infantile meningitis, it can be used as a choice of medication.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于敏感菌所致的呼吸道、泌尿道、骨和关节、皮肤和软组织、腹腔、胆道、五官、生殖器等部位的感染，对烧伤、外伤引起的感染以及败血症、中枢感染也有效。尤其是婴幼儿脑膜炎可作为选用药物。

law_content: Wenjing Sanhan, Qufeng Huoxue, Tongluo Zhitong. Suitable for lumbar and cervical spondylosis, osteoarthritis, frozen shoulder, and rheumatoid arthritis.
zh_law_content: 温经散寒，祛风活血，通络止痛。适用于腰、颈椎骨质增生，骨性关节病，肩周炎，风湿性关节炎。

law_content: Clear heat and detoxify, reduce swelling and relieve pain. Used for ulceration, burning fever, purulent discharge, festering, erysipelas, herpes, scabies, and itching.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒，消肿止痛。用于疮疖溃烂，灼热发烧，流脓流水，丹毒疱疹，疥癣疼痒。

law_content: This product can break up accumulation, expel worms, and stimulate appetite. It is used for symptoms such as food accumulation and indigestion in children, fever and abdominal distension, vomiting and constipation, and abdominal pain.
zh_law_content: 本品破积驱虫、开胃进食。用于小儿食积，乳积，发热腹胀，呕吐滞下及腹痛等症。

law_content: This product is used for wind-cold-damp bi syndrome, shoulder and back pain, lumbago and leg weakness, muscle and tendon spasms, numbness in the limbs, joint soreness, weakness in the muscles and bones, and difficulty walking.
zh_law_content: 本品用于风寒湿痹，肩背疼痛，腰酸腿软，筋脉拘挛，四肢麻木，关节酸痛，筋骨无力，行步艰难。

law_content: Clear heat, detoxify, and relieve pain. Used for herpes zoster, herpes simplex, pustular dermatitis, folliculitis, and acne.
zh_law_content: 清热、解毒、止痛。用于带状疱疹、单纯疱疹、脓疱疹、毛囊炎、痤疮。

law_content: Clearing qi and eliminating phlegm, moistening the lungs and stopping coughing. Used for cough and asthma caused by cold, bronchitis, and pharyngitis with excessive phlegm.
zh_law_content: 理气祛痰，润肺止咳。用于感冒、支气管炎、咽喉炎引起的痰多咳嗽、气喘。

law_content: Tonify the spleen and stomach, soothe the liver and eliminate parasites. Used for weakness of the spleen and liver, pale complexion, thin muscles, and digestive disorders.
zh_law_content: 健脾和胃，平肝杀虫。用于脾弱肝滞，面黄肌瘦，消化不良。

law_content: This product is used for the treatment of acute and recovery stages of cerebral thrombosis. According to traditional Chinese medicine differentiation, it belongs to the syndrome of Qi deficiency and blood stasis. The symptoms include hemiplegia, numbness on one side of the body, facial asymmetry, slurred speech, shortness of breath, and weakness.
zh_law_content: 本品用于治疗脑血栓急性期和恢复期，中医辩证属气虚血瘀型，症见半身不遂、偏身麻木、口眼歪斜、舌强言蹇、气短乏力等。

law_content: Soothing liver and regulating Qi, promoting blood circulation and resolving stasis, dissipating breast masses. Used for liver qi stagnation, qi stagnation and blood stasis, breast hyperplasia, and breast swelling and pain.
zh_law_content: 疏肝理气，活血化瘀，消散乳块。用于肝气郁积，气滞血瘀，乳腺增生，乳房胀痛

law_content: This product is indicated for the treatment of adult patients with Philadelphia chromosome positive (Ph+) chronic myeloid leukemia (CML) in chronic phase, accelerated phase, or blast phase (acute lymphoblastic leukemia or acute myeloid leukemia) who are resistant or intolerant to imatinib mesylate.
zh_law_content: 本品用于治疗对甲磺酸伊马替尼耐药，或不耐受的费城染色体阳性（Ph+）慢性髓细胞白血病（CML）慢性期、加速期和急变期（急粒变和急淋变）成年患者。

law_content:
1. This product is mainly used for various bleeding caused by acute or chronic, local or systemic primary fibrinolysis hyperactivity. It is generally not used for secondary hyperfibrinolysis caused by disseminated intravascular coagulation before heparinization.
2. It is used for traumatic or surgical bleeding in organs rich in fibrinolysis activators such as prostate, urethra, lung, brain, uterus, adrenal gland, thyroid, etc.
3. It is used as an antagonist of tissue-type plasminogen activator (t-PA), plasminogen activator inhibitor and urinary activator.
4. It is used for fibrinolytic bleeding caused by induced abortion, early detachment of placenta, stillbirth, amniotic fluid embolism, and pathological excessive menstruation with localized increased fibrinolysis in the uterine cavity.
5. It is used for mild bleeding in central nervous system disorders, such as subarachnoid hemorrhage and intracranial aneurysm hemorrhage. The use of this product for hemostasis is superior to other antifibrinolytic drugs, but attention must be paid to the risk of concurrent cerebral edema or cerebral infarction. For patients with severe disease requiring surgery, this product can only be used as an adjunctive therapy.
6. It is used to treat hereditary angioedema and can reduce the frequency and severity of attacks.
7. It can be used in conjunction with this medication for active bleeding in patients with hemophilia.
8. It is used to prevent or reduce post-extraction or post-oral surgery bleeding in patients with hemophilia A or hemophilia B deficiency of factor VIII or factor IX.
zh_law_content:
1、本品主要用于急性或慢性、局限性或全身性原发性纤维蛋白溶解亢进所致的各种出血。弥散性血管内凝血所致的继发性高纤溶状态，在未肝素化前，一般不用本品。
2、用于前列腺、尿道、肺、脑、子宫、肾上腺、甲状腺等富有纤溶酶原激活物脏器的外伤或手术出血。
3、用作组织型纤溶酶原激活物（t-PA）、链激酶及尿激酶的拮抗物。
4、用于人工流产、胎盘早期剥落、死胎和羊水栓塞引起的纤溶性出血，以及病理性宫腔内局部纤溶性增高的月经过多症。
5、用于中枢神经病变轻症出血，如蛛网膜下腔出血和颅内动脉瘤出血，应用本品止血优于其它抗纤溶药，但必须注意并发脑水肿或脑梗塞的危险性，至于重症有手术指征患者，本品仅可作辅助用药。
6、用于治疗遗传性血管神经性水肿，可减少其发作次数和严重程度。
7、血友病患者发生活动性出血，可联合应用本药。
8、用于防止或减轻因子Ⅷ或因子Ⅸ缺乏的血友病患者拔牙或口腔手术后的出血。

law_content: Clearing heat and detoxification, stopping cough and dissolving phlegm. Used for cold, pharyngitis, tonsillitis, and bronchitis with cough.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒，止咳化痰。用于感冒，咽炎、扁桃体炎、支气管炎咳嗽。

law_content: Used for the prevention and treatment of arteriosclerosis and the reduction of blood lipid levels.
zh_law_content: 用于防治动脉硬化、降低血脂等。

law_content: Used for vitamin C deficiency.
zh_law_content: 用于维生素C缺乏症。

law_content: Tonify Qi and invigorate the body. Used for qi deficiency and physical weakness, with weakness in the limbs.
zh_law_content: 补益元气。用于气虚体弱，四肢无力。

law_content:
1. This product is used for the excited state of schizophrenia and manic episodes.
2. This product has a neuroleptic effect and enhances the analgesic effect of analgesics. When used in combination with fentanyl for intravenous injection, it can induce a special anesthesia state in patients, known as neuroleptic analgesia. It is used for dressing changes in large-area burns and various endoscopic examinations.
zh_law_content:
1、本品用于精神分裂症和躁狂症兴奋状态。
2、本品有神经安定作用及增强镇痛药的镇痛作用，与芬太尼合用静脉注射时，可使病人产生特殊麻醉状态，称为神经安定镇痛术，用于大面积烧伤换药，各种内窥镜检查。

law_content: Relieve wind and pain, soothe tendons and activate collaterals. Used for trigeminal neuralgia and sciatica caused by wind obstruction and rheumatoid arthritis.
zh_law_content: 祛风止痛、舒筋活络。用于风邪阻络型三叉神经痛，坐骨神经痛，风湿关节痛。

law_content: This product is used for the symptoms of cold limbs, soreness and weakness of the waist and knees, and fatigue caused by kidney deficiency.
zh_law_content: 本品用于肾虚引起的畏寒肢冷，腰膝酸软，神疲乏力。

law_content: This product is used for skin and soft tissue infections, respiratory tract infections, streptococcal pharyngitis, scarlet fever, diphtheria, Legionnaire's disease, pertussis, as well as gonorrhea, non-gonococcal urethritis, acne, etc., caused by gram-positive bacteria.
zh_law_content: 本品用于革兰阳性菌所致的皮肤软组织感染、呼吸道感染、链球菌咽峡炎、猩红热、白喉、军团菌病、百日咳等，以及淋病、非淋病性尿道炎、痤疮等。

law_content: Activating blood circulation and promoting qi to nourish yin. Used to treat retinal vein occlusion with blood stasis and qi-yin deficiency, presenting symptoms such as decreased vision or visual abnormalities, fundus hemorrhage signs, fatigue, dry throat, and dry mouth; as well as stable effort-induced angina with blood stasis and qi-yin deficiency, presenting symptoms such as chest tightness, palpitations, anxiety, shortness of breath, and restlessness with dry mouth.
zh_law_content: 活血化瘀，益气养阴。用于治疗血瘀兼气阴两虚证的视网膜静脉阻塞，症见视力下降 或视觉异常，眼底瘀血征象，神疲乏力，咽干，口干等；以及用于治疗血瘀兼气阴两虚的稳定性 劳累型心绞痛，症见胸闷痛、心悸、心慌、气短乏力、心烦口干者。

law_content: Applicable for the following symptoms: toothache, menstrual pain, pain caused by trauma (e.g. sports injury), joint and ligament pain, back pain, headache, and fever caused by influenza.
zh_law_content: 适用于下列症状：牙痛、痛经、因创伤引起的疼痛(例如：运动性损伤)、关节和韧带痛、背痛、头痛、以及流感引起的发热。

law_content: This product is used for the prevention and treatment of thrombosis, arteriosclerosis. It can also be used for vitamin B2 deficiency, oral ulcers, scrotal inflammation, seborrheic dermatitis.
zh_law_content: 本品用于防治血栓形成，动脉粥样硬化。也可用于维生素B2缺乏、口腔溃疡、阴囊炎、脂溢性皮炎。

law_content: This product is used for bleeding caused by Yin deficiency and blood heat; it is also used for cases of thrombocytopenia with the aforementioned symptoms.
zh_law_content: 本品用于阴虚血热所致的出血；血小板减少症见上述证候者。

law_name: 长春西汀氯化钠注射液
law_content: This product is used to improve various symptoms caused by post-stroke sequelae, post-cerebral hemorrhage sequelae, cerebral atherosclerosis, etc.
zh_law_content: 本品用于改善脑梗塞后遗症、脑出血后遗症、脑动脉硬化症等诱发的各种症状。

law_content: Clear the vision and remove the opacity. Used for early cataract and corneal opacity.
zh_law_content: 明目退翳。用于初发白内障及角膜斑翳。

law_name: 醋酸氢化可的松滴眼液
law_content: This product is used for iridocyclitis, keratitis, iritis, conjunctivitis, etc.
zh_law_content: 本品用于虹膜睫状体炎﹑角膜炎﹑虹膜炎﹑结膜炎等。

law_name: 注射用甲磺酸法舒地尔
law_content: This product is suitable for preventing and improving cerebral vasospasm and resulting brain ischemic symptoms after subarachnoid hemorrhage surgery.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于预防和改善蛛网膜下腔出血术后的脑血管痉挛及其引起的脑缺血症状。

law_content: This product is used to treat respiratory diseases such as bronchial asthma or wheezing bronchitis, accompanied by bronchospasm.
zh_law_content: 本品用于治疗支气管哮喘或喘息型支气管炎等伴有支气管痉挛的呼吸道疾患。

law_name: 注射用阿莫西林钠克拉维酸钾
law_content:
This product is suitable for the following infections caused by beta-lactamase-sensitive bacteria:

1. Upper respiratory tract infections: sinusitis, tonsillitis, pharyngitis.
2. Lower respiratory tract infections: acute bronchitis, exacerbation of chronic bronchitis, pneumonia, lung abscess, and bronchiectasis with infection.
3. Urinary tract infections: cystitis, urethritis, pyelonephritis, prostatitis, pelvic inflammatory disease, and Neisseria gonorrhoeae urinary tract infections.
4. Skin and soft tissue infections: boils, abscesses, cellulitis, and wound infections.
5. Other infections: otitis media, osteomyelitis, sepsis, peritonitis, and postoperative infections.
zh_law_content:
本品适用于产β-内酰胺酶的敏感菌所致的下列感染：
1、上呼吸道感染：鼻窦炎、扁桃体炎、咽炎。
2、下呼吸道感染：急性支气管炎、慢性支气管炎急性发作肺炎、肺脓肿和支气管扩张合并感染。
3、泌尿系统感染：膀胱炎、尿道炎、肾盂肾炎、前列腺炎、盆腔炎、淋病奈瑟菌尿路感染。
4、皮肤和软组织感染：疖、脓肿、蜂窝组织炎、伤口感染等。
5、其它感染：中耳炎、骨髓炎、败血症、腹膜炎和手术后感染。

law_content: Tonify the spleen and invigorate qi. Used for general weakness and weakness in the limbs caused by spleen qi deficiency.
zh_law_content: 补脾益气。用于脾气虚所致的体弱、四肢无力。

law_content: Applicable to infections caused by penicillin-resistant Staphylococcus and dual infections caused by Staphylococcus and Streptococcus. Including: bone and joint infections, endocarditis, peritonitis, pneumonia, skin infections, soft tissue infections, surgical site infections, etc.
zh_law_content: 适用于对青霉素耐药的葡萄球菌所致感染及葡萄球菌和链球菌所致双重感染。包括：骨和关节感染、心内膜炎、腹膜炎、肺炎、皮肤感染、软组织感染、手术后伤口感染等。

law_content: Promote blood circulation, dispel cold, and relieve pain. Used for sprains, joint soreness, etc.
zh_law_content: 活血、散寒、止痛。用于扭挫伤，关节酸痛等。

law_content: Used for Candidal vulvovaginitis.
zh_law_content: 用于念珠菌性外阴阴道炎。

law_content:
Tibetan Medicine: Unblock blood vessels, promote Qi circulation, and cool the blood. Used for hyperlipidemia caused by blood heat. 
Traditional Chinese Medicine: Promote blood circulation and resolve phlegm. Used for hyperlipidemia caused by phlegm and blood stasis.
zh_law_content: 藏医：通道血脉，行气凉血。用于血热所引起的高脂血症。中医：活血化痰。用于痰瘀血阻引起的高脂血症。

law_content:
Levonorgestrel pill, Levonorgestrel tablet, Levonorgestrel enteric-coated tablet, Levonorgestrel dispersible tablet, Levonorgestrel capsule, Levonorgestrel enteric-coated capsule: 
Used for emergency contraception in women, specifically in cases of unprotected sex or contraceptive failure, such as condom slip or break, failure to withdraw during intercourse, or miscalculation of safe period.

Levonorgestrel silastic rod (I), Levonorgestrel silastic rod (II): 
Used for long-term contraception in women of reproductive age.

Levonorgestrel intrauterine system:
Used for contraception and treatment of idiopathic menorrhagia, which refers to excessive menstrual bleeding not caused by organic abnormalities.
zh_law_content:
左炔诺孕酮滴丸、左炔诺孕酮片、左炔诺孕酮肠溶片、左炔诺孕酮分散片、左炔诺孕酮胶囊、左炔诺孕酮肠溶胶囊：
用于女性紧急避孕，即在无防护措施或其他避孕方法失误时使用；这些失误包括避孕套滑脱或破裂、体外排精失控、或安全期计算失误等。
左炔诺孕酮硅胶棒（Ⅰ）、左炔诺孕酮硅胶棒（Ⅱ）：
用于育龄妇女，要求长期避孕者。
左炔诺孕酮宫内节育系统：
用于避孕，治疗特发性月经过多，即非器质性病变引起的月经过多。

law_content: Nourishes the liver and kidneys, enriches the essence and blood, darkens the hair and promotes strong muscles and bones. Used for symptoms of blood deficiency such as yellowing complexion, dizziness, tinnitus, premature graying of hair, weak lower back and knees, and numbness in the limbs.
zh_law_content: 补肝肾，益精血，乌须发，强筋骨。用于血虚萎黄，眩晕耳鸣，须发早白，腰膝酸软，肢体麻木。

law_content: This product is suitable for relieving symptoms of allergic rhinitis, including hay fever. It is also suitable for chronic spontaneous urticaria, dermatographism, cholinergic urticaria, and acquired cold urticaria.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于缓解过敏性鼻炎，包括枯草热的疾病症状，也适用于慢性自发性荨麻疹、皮肤划痕症、胆碱能性荨麻疹和特发性获得性寒冷性荨麻疹。

law_content: This product is used for gingival swelling and pain caused by internal heat and for oral ulcers.
zh_law_content: 本品用于火热内闭引起的牙龈肿痛，口舌生疮。

law_content: Clear heat and detoxify, cool blood and promote urination. Used for hot urinary dysfunction caused by damp heat in the lower part of the body, manifested as frequent urination, urgent urination, painful urination, lower back pain, and distention in the lower abdomen.
zh_law_content: 清热解毒，凉血通淋。用于下焦湿热所致的热淋，症见尿频、尿急、尿痛、腰痛、小腹坠胀。

law_content: This product is used for deficiency of yang energy and fixed blood loss, symptoms of which include aversion to cold, cold limbs, sore and weak lower back, clear urine and loose stools, and dark and pale spots under the skin. It can also be used for mild idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura with the above symptoms.
zh_law_content: 本品用于阳气虚损、血失固摄，症见畏寒肢冷，腰酸乏力，尿清便溏，皮下紫斑，其色淡暗。亦可用于轻型原发性血小板减少性紫癜具上述证候者。

law_content: This product is used for treating heat invasion of the pericardium, phlegm heat obstruction, unclear consciousness, convulsions in children with epilepsy, and spasm of limbs.
zh_law_content: 本品用于热入心包，痰热蒙蔽，神志不清，小儿惊风痰壅，手足抽搐。

law_content: Antimitotic and cytotoxic drugs. Docetaxel can successfully induce remission of various malignant tumors, including acute leukemia, lymphoma, soft tissue and bone sarcoma, pediatric malignant tumors, and adult solid tumors, especially in breast cancer and lung cancer.
zh_law_content: 抗有丝分裂和细胞毒性药物。多柔比星能成功地诱导多种恶性肿瘤的缓解，包括急性白血病、淋巴瘤、软组织和骨肉瘤、儿童恶性肿瘤及成人实体瘤，尤其用于乳腺癌和肺癌。

law_content: Nourish Yin and Tonify Qi, Regulate Spleen and Stomach. Symptoms such as chest stuffiness and nausea caused by weak spleen and stomach, loss of appetite, fatigue, and loose stools.
zh_law_content: 滋阴补气，调养脾胃。用脾胃虚弱引起的胸闷作呕，食欲不振，精神倦怠，大便溏泄。

law_content: Used to treat patients with thick, difficult-to-expectorate sputum caused by chronic bronchitis, bronchial asthma, and other respiratory diseases.
zh_law_content: 用于治疗慢性支气管炎、支气管哮喘等疾病引起的痰液粘稠、咳痰困难患者。

law_content: This product is used for the treatment of breast cancer, stomach cancer, colon cancer, rectal cancer, and nasopharyngeal cancer.
zh_law_content: 本品用于治疗乳腺癌、胃癌、结肠癌、直肠癌、鼻咽癌。

law_content: This product is used for various types of tuberculosis and can also be used for other forms of tuberculosis. It is suitable for tuberculosis patients who are allergic or resistant to certain anti-tuberculosis drugs, as well as those with liver disease.
zh_law_content: 本品用于各型肺结核，也可以用于其他结核，适用于对某些抗结核药过敏、耐药及合并肝病的结核病患者。

law_content: Promote blood circulation and remove blood stasis, dispel wind, and relieve cold. Used for numbness caused by wind and cold, joint and muscle pain, bruises and sprains, and displaced waist and qi.
zh_law_content: 活血化瘀，祛风散寒。用于风寒麻木，筋骨疼痛，跌打损伤，闪腰岔气。

law_name: 复方忍冬藤阿司匹林片
law_content: Used for fever, headache, body aches, runny nose, sneezing, and sore throat caused by common cold and influenza.
zh_law_content: 用于普通感冒及流行性感冒引起的发热、头痛、四肢酸痛、流鼻涕、打喷嚏、咽痛。

law_content: This product is used for patients with damp-heat accumulation in the lower abdomen, including conditions such as pelvic inflammatory disease, endometriosis, and annex inflammation.
zh_law_content: 本品用于附件炎，子宫内膜炎，盆腔炎属湿热下注证者。

law_content:
1. Edematous diseases, excessive excretion of sodium and water, reduction of extracellular fluid volume, elimination of edema. Common ones include congestive heart failure, ascites in liver cirrhosis, nephrotic syndrome, edema in acute and chronic nephritis, early stage of chronic renal failure, sodium and water retention caused by adrenal cortical hormone and estrogen therapy.
2. Hypertension, can be used alone or in combination with other antihypertensive drugs, mainly used for the treatment of primary hypertension.
3. Central or renal diabetes insipidus.
4. Nephrolithiasis, mainly used for the prevention of calcium salt composition stones.
zh_law_content:
1、水肿性疾病，排泄体内过多的钠和水，减少细胞外液容量，消除水肿。常见的包括充血性心力衰竭、肝硬化腹水、肾病综合征、急慢性肾炎水肿、慢性肾功能衰竭早期、肾上腺皮质激素和雌激素治疗所致的钠、水潴留。
2、高血压，可单独或与其他降压药联合应用，主要用于治疗原发性高血压。
3、中枢性或肾性尿崩症。
4、肾石症，主要用于预防含钙盐成分形成的结石。

law_content: Nourish Yin, clear heat, and nourish the liver and kidneys. Used for chronic hepatitis, as well as post-hepatitis syndrome.
zh_law_content: 养阴清热，滋补肝肾。用于慢性肝炎，肝炎后综合症。

law_content: Promoting blood circulation and removing blood stasis, unblocking meridians and relieving pain. It is used for coronary heart disease and angina caused by blood stasis and obstruction, with symptoms such as chest pain, chest tightness, palpitations, and shortness of breath.
zh_law_content: 活血化瘀，通脉止痛。用于心血瘀阻引起的冠心病、心绞痛，症见胸痛、胸闷、心慌、气短等。

law_content: This product is used for hemorrhoids caused by damp-heat in the large intestine.
zh_law_content: 本品用于大肠湿热所致痔疮。

law_content: Tonify the yang of the kidneys. Used for kidney yang deficiency, sore and cold lower back and knees, difficulty or excessive urination, and phlegm and fluid accumulation with coughing and wheezing.
zh_law_content: 温补肾阳。用于肾阳不足，腰膝痠冷，小便不利或反多，痰饮喘咳。

law_content: Disperses wind, clears heat, detoxifies, and soothes the throat. Used for cold with external invasion of wind and heat, and internal disturbance of pathogenic heat. Symptoms include: fever, slight aversion to wind, headache, sore throat, nasal congestion, runny nose, cough with thick phlegm, thirst, and yellow urine.
zh_law_content: 疏风清热，解毒利咽。用于感冒属风热外侵，邪热内扰证者，症见：发热，微恶风，头痛，咽痛，鼻塞流涕，咳嗽痰粘，口渴溲黄。

law_content: This product is used for the syndrome of fire decline in the Gate of Life, with symptoms of soreness and weakness in the waist and knees, aversion to cold and cold limbs, fatigue and weakness, pale tongue with white coating, and deep, thin, and weak pulse.
zh_law_content: 本品用于命门火衰证，症见腰膝酸软，畏寒肢冷，神疲乏力，舌淡苔白，脉沉细弱等。

law_content: Nourish the lungs and tonify the kidneys, calm the heart and soothe the mind. Used for insomnia, palpitations, spontaneous sweating, and night sweats.
zh_law_content: 敛肺补肾，养心安神。用于失眠，心悸，自汗，盗汗。

law_content: This product is used for treating redness, inflammation, and cloudy vision in the eyes caused by an acute outbreak.
zh_law_content: 本品用于暴发火眼，眼边赤烂，黑睛云翳。

law_content:
This product is used to treat infections caused by Staphylococcus, Streptococcus, Pneumococcus, Enterococcus, Moraxella catarrhalis, Escherichia coli, Shigella, non-typhoidal Salmonella, Citrobacter, Klebsiella, Enterobacter, Serratia, Proteus, Vibrio cholerae, influenza, Pseudomonas, and Enterococcus bacteria that are susceptible to Ulifloxacin. These infections include:

1. Superficial skin infections (acute superficial folliculitis, contagious impetigo), deep skin infections (cellulitis, erysipelas, furuncles, carbuncles, suppurative paronychia), and chronic pyoderma (infected sebaceous cysts, suppurative hidradenitis, subcutaneous abscesses).

2. Perianal abscesses, secondary superficial infections due to trauma, burns, and surgical wounds.

3. Acute upper respiratory tract infections (pharyngitis, tonsillitis, acute bronchitis) and secondary infections of chronic respiratory diseases (chronic bronchitis, diffuse bronchiolitis, bronchiectasis, emphysema, interstitial lung disease, bronchial asthma) and pneumonia.

4. Cystitis, pyelonephritis, prostatitis.

5. Cholecystitis, cholangitis.

6. Infectious enteritis, bacterial dysentery, salmonellosis, cholera.

7. Intrauterine infection, pelvic inflammatory disease.

8. Blepharitis, hordeolum.

9. Otitis media, sinusitis.
zh_law_content:
本品用于治疗对普卢利沙星活性主体（Ulifloxacin）敏感的葡萄球菌、链球菌、肺炎球菌、肠球菌、莫拉克斯氏菌、大肠菌、志贺杆菌、沙门氏菌（伤寒菌、副伤寒菌除外）、柠檬酸菌、克雷伯氏菌、肠杆菌、沙雷氏菌属、变形杆菌、霍乱菌、流感菌、绿脓菌、消化链球菌引起的下列感染：
1、浅表性皮肤感染症（急性浅表性毛囊炎、传染性脓痂疹）、深层皮肤感染症（蜂窝织炎、丹毒、疖、疖肿症、痈、化脓性甲周炎）、慢性脓皮症（感染性皮脂腺囊肿、化脓性汗腺炎、皮下脓肿）。
2、肛门周围脓肿、外伤和烫伤以及手术创伤等浅表性继发性感染。
3、急性上呼吸道感染（咽喉炎、扁桃体炎、急性支气管炎等）、慢性呼吸系统疾病的继发性感染（慢性支气管炎、弥漫性细支气管炎、支气管扩张、肺气肿、肺纤维病、支气管哮喘等）和肺炎。
4、膀胱炎、肾盂肾炎、前列腺炎。
5、胆囊炎、胆管炎。
6、感染性肠炎、细菌性痢疾、沙门氏病、霍乱。
7、子宫内感染、子宫附件炎。
8、眼睑炎、麦粒肿。
9、中耳炎、副鼻窦炎。

law_content: This product is used for lumbago and weakness of the knees caused by spleen and kidney yang deficiency, accompanied by aversion to cold, cold limbs, fatigue, lack of strength, poor appetite, loose stools, and difficulty urinating.
zh_law_content: 本品用于脾肾阳虚所致的腰膝酸软，畏寒肢冷，体倦乏力，食少便溏，排尿不畅。

law_content: Nourishes the kidney yang, boosts Qi and nourishes blood. Used for symptoms such as lumbago caused by weak kidney yang and insufficient Qi and blood, aversion to cold with cold limbs, low spirits, shortness of breath, fatigue, frequent and clear urination.
zh_law_content: 温补肾阳，益气养血。用于肾阳虚弱、气血不足所致的腰背酸痛，畏寒肢冷，精神不振，气短乏力，小便频数清长等症。

law_content: This product is mainly used for mild to moderate infections caused by penicillin G-sensitive strains, such as upper respiratory tract infections, scarlet fever, bronchitis, pneumonia, erysipelas, cellulitis, etc. It can also be used as prophylactic medication for rheumatic fever recurrence and infective endocarditis.
zh_law_content: 本品主要用于对青霉素G敏感菌株的轻度、中度感染症：如上呼吸道感染、猩红热、支气管炎、肺炎、丹毒、蜂窝组织炎等。也可作为风湿热复发和感染性心内膜炎的预防用药。

law_content: Clearing heat, promoting diuresis, and reducing swelling, suitable for acute and chronic nephritis and urinary tract infections.
zh_law_content: 清热利水消肿，用于急慢性肾炎，泌尿道感染

law_name: 盐酸异丙肾上腺素注射液
law_content:
1. Treatment of cardiogenic or septic shock.
2. Treatment of complete atrioventricular block and cardiac arrest.
zh_law_content:
1、治疗心源性或感染性休克。
2、治疗完全性房室传导阻滞、心搏骤停。

law_content: Digestive disorder. Used for selective eating and loss of appetite caused by stagnation of food.
zh_law_content: 消积化食。用于食积停滞所致的偏食、厌食。

law_content: Nourishing Yin and clearing heat, nurturing the heart and calming the mind. Suitable for insomnia, palpitations, dizziness, ringing in the ears, and restlessness caused by Yin deficiency and excessive fire.
zh_law_content: 滋阴清热，养心安神。适用于阴虚火旺所致的不寐心悸，头晕耳鸣，五心烦热。

law_content: This product is suitable for external use in the treatment of plaque psoriasis and common acne.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于外用治疗寻常性斑块型银屑病及寻常痤疮。

law_content: This product is used for relieving back pain caused by lumbar sprains, acute injuries, and acute strains.
zh_law_content: 本品用于闪跌扭伤与急性劳损等腰痛。

law_name: 九价人乳头瘤病毒疫苗(酿酒酵母)
law_content:
This product is indicated for the prevention of the following diseases caused by the HPV types contained in the product:
1. Cervical cancer caused by HPV types 16, 18, 31, 33, 45, 52, and 58.
2. Precancerous or atypical lesions caused by HPV types 6, 11, 16, 18, 31, 33, 45, 52, and 58, including:
   (a) Cervical intraepithelial neoplasia (CIN) grade 2/3 and cervical adenocarcinoma in situ (AIS).
   (b) Cervical intraepithelial neoplasia (CIN) grade 1.
3. Infections caused by HPV types 6, 11, 16, 18, 31, 33, 45, 52, and 58.
zh_law_content:
本品适用于预防由本品所含的HPV型别引起的下列疾病：
1、HPV16型、18型、31型、33型、45型、52型、58型引起的宫颈癌。
2、由HPV6型、11型、16型、18型、31型、33型、45型、52型、58型引起的下列癌前病变或不典型病变：
（1）宫颈上皮内瘤样病变（CIN）2/3级，以及宫颈原位腺癌（AIS）。
（2）宫颈上皮内瘤样病变（CIN）1级。
3、HPV6型、11型、16型、18型、31型、33型、45型、52型、58型引起的感染。

law_content: Mainly used for the treatment of advanced breast cancer and advanced endometrial cancer, with some efficacy in renal cancer, prostate cancer, and ovarian cancer. It can also improve appetite and cachexia in advanced cancer patients.
zh_law_content: 主要用于治疗晚期乳腺癌和晚期子宫内膜癌，对肾癌、前列腺癌和卵巢癌也有一定疗效。并可改善晚期肿瘤患者的食欲和恶病质。

law_content: This product is indicated for use in adult patients with multiple myeloma who have received at least one prior therapy, in combination with dexamethasone.
zh_law_content: 本品适用于与地塞米松合用，治疗曾接受过至少一种疗法的多发性骨髓瘤的成年患者。

law_content: Relieve muscle tension, regulate the balance of ying and wei. Used for external wind invasion, headache and fever, nasal congestion and dry retching, excessive sweating and aversion to wind.
zh_law_content: 解肌发表，调和营卫。用于外感风邪，头痛发热，鼻塞干呕，汗出恶风。

law_content: Tonify liver and kidneys, strengthen muscles and bones, lower blood pressure. Used for kidney deficiency, lumbago, and weak lower back and knees; for patients with high blood pressure presenting the above symptoms.
zh_law_content: 补肝肾，强筋骨，降血压。用于肾虚腰痛，腰膝无力；高血压见上述症状者。

law_content: Clearing heat, eliminating toxins, and promoting mental clarity. Used for leprosy, eczema, redness and swelling of limbs and joints, yellow water disease, and all diseases caused by wind and toxic pathogenic factors.
zh_law_content: 清热、杀疠、开窍。用于麻风、湿疹，四肢关节红肿，黄水病，风邪毒气引起的一切疾病。

law_content: This product is used for the local pain, swelling, bruising, and functional impairment caused by sprains; it can also be used to relieve pain and restricted movement caused by osteoarthritis and other symptoms.
zh_law_content: 本品用于扭挫伤引起的局部疼痛、肿胀、瘀斑、肢体功能障碍；也可用于缓解骨关节炎引起的疼痛和活动受限等症状。

law_content: This product is a general anesthetic adjuvant used for tracheal intubation during routine induction of anesthesia, as well as for maintaining neuromuscular blockade of skeletal muscles during surgery.
zh_law_content: 本品为全身麻醉辅助用药，用于常规诱导麻醉期间气管插管，以及维持术中骨骼肌的神经肌肉阻滞。

law_content: Tonifying Qi and nourishing Yin, kidney and spleen, clearing residual toxins.
